title: How to Freshen Stale or Musty Soft Toys

steps.headline: Place the soft toy in the paper bag.
Add the baking soda to the bag.
Fold down the bag so that it is tight.
Shake the bag to let the baking soda move around the soft toy.
steps.description: Do this for about a minute.

steps.headline: Remove the soft toy and shake off any excess baking soda.
Place the soft toy in the sun for a few hours to complete the process.
steps.description: Store it in a cleaner place after.

tyn: Paper bag larger enough to cover the toy(s)
text: Place the soft toy in the paper bag.  Add the baking soda to the bag.  Fold down the bag so that it is tight.  Shake the bag to let the baking soda move around the soft toy. Do this for about a minute. Remove the soft toy and shake off any excess baking soda.  Place the soft toy in the sun for a few hours to complete the process. Store it in a cleaner place after.

Fold down the bag so that it is tight.
Shake the bag to let the baking soda move around the soft toy.
Do this for about a minute.
Remove the soft toy and shake off any excess baking soda.
Place the soft toy in the sun for a few hours to complete the process.
Store it in a cleaner place after.
